data.title: Birthday dinner for daughter
data.text:
Food was excellent, wait staff was excellent.
We had reservations for 10 people we did not have to wait and we were served quickly.
Awesome experience

data.title: Late Sunday dinner
data.text: Went to Green Bay Packers football game on Sunday at 3:30. Didn't get back to Appleton until 9pm due to traffic.  Not many places open, but found this restaurant. Fun decor and quick service.  I had a salad and baked potato. The salad was fresh and included mixed greens! My Dad had a Caeser Salad with Chicken.  We both were hungry and grateful for a good meal at such a late hour.

data.title: Good food! Interesting atmosphere!
data.text: Unique setting! We sat up in the 'library!   We had 7 in our party, but there were two other VERY large groups sitting in that same room, and at times it was so loud that it was impossible for us to talk to each other.  That certainly wasn't the restaurants fault. The portions were large, and the food was good. I felt that the prices bordered on the high side. I would definitely go back!

data.title: Dinner - gluten freeish, not celiac friendly
data.text:
I went for dinner with a friend. I had to ask for a gluten free; they told me to check the website, but it is not on it.

Food can be prepared gluten free but celiacs is a no. The staff would not communicate my food allergy to kitchen so I had no way of knowing if they contaminated. My favorite answer was yes and most likely food would be contaminated and why would I bother eating out. 

Food came fast. I carefully ate the baked potato as I really hoped that they could not contaminate that.

It's not really a good place to eat and chat; waitress came back 15 minutes later and asked if we needed boxes; she took my food before I was finished and didn't come back to refill waters once she dropped the bill - under 30 minutes. 

If you need to eat and run; it's a great place. My friend's food was good. 

The place has some really great old pictures and a good bar.

data.title: A fun, old timey, yet hip place!
data.text:
We love Good Company! Went here multiple times. A few with the whole family, and once to meet an old friend who was in town. This restaurant never disappoints. The interior is so much fun to see all on its own.. it reminds me of a mix between a museum and an old fashioned amusement park. 
And of course the food is perfect to match. I thoroughly enjoy their Reuben sandwich. Their fish is delicious!! Hi on a Friday and try the fish fry. Perfectly cooked, buttery smooth. Good Company became our family favorite in Appleton!

data.title: Awesome food and service
data.text: We asked a friend where to get a good fish fry in the Appleton area.  Without hesitation she suggested The Good Company.  We were really happy that we listened.  The food was fantastic with generous portions and some of the best mashed potatoes that I've ever had.  Our serve Megan R.  Was on top of everything and very attentive.  We can't wait to go back.

data.title: Great service and good food
data.text: Very pleasant and friendly staff. Food was great with generous servings. Very relaxing atmosphere and tastefully decorated. The burgers were done to perfection and we really had a good time here.

data.title: Lunch
data.text: Drove by and noticed the building and saw they served food.  Checked the menu online and it sounded good.  We each had a burger and onion rings. Food was good as was the service.  The interior of the building is really cool. We will eat here again.  Price was reasonable .

data.title: nice decor, food good
data.text: This place (including its former incarnations) has been a staple of the food scene since the 1970's (when it was "Baxters"). Very interesting décor makes a nice mood. They have kind of everything. Nothing's great but really, nothing is horrible. This is a great first date place because it won't cost a lot, can get some drinks, decent food, decent desert and enough stuff around to help with a conversation. It's also fairly intimate .

data.title: I held our company party at Good Compay.
data.text: Very good service. There were 13 people in attendance and all were very satisfied with the serve and meal. They have an area for private parties.

data.title: Cool interior, meh food
data.text: The interior is nicely decorated but the food is often salty and nothing special. There is nothing of note about the drink menu.

data.title: Not thrilled
data.text: Family get together on a Saturday night.  The decor was really nice, clean, good service on a very busy evening.  Food not so good.  I had their Saturday special which was the prime rib, 2 others in our party had the same.  Awful!   Tasted like processed meat, something they tossed in the microwave.  Absolutely tasteless.   On a good note our prime rib meals were comped.  My son had cod fish and fries, not bad but have eaten better.  Wouldn't waste my time eating here again but ok for a drink!

data.title: yes it is ...
data.text: of the many, many dining options in the area, this one has above average parking, atmosphere, service and food

data.title: Lots if options, great for groups
data.text: The menu is huge and varied. The restaurant itself is multi-level with lots of seating. The food is unextraordinary but solid and not bad. Its a great place for groups, meetings,showers, rehearsal dinners etc

data.title: Small Wedding dinner
data.text: This was an excellent place to have a small wedding dinner with our family and friends. They were very accommodating and very friendly! The food was also excellent and they were able to keep up with our group. Thank you so much for the lovely evening and completing our small wedding.

data.title: Good Eats and Drinks
data.text: Good Co. provides a nice atmosphere for drinks and dinner with friends or family.  Every time I have visited I have been very happy with the drink selections and food quality.  I have always been served generous portions at a fair price.

data.title: Unique atmosphere, relaxed, food leaves a lot to be desired
data.text: I have been to Good Company a couple times-- thought maybe I just ordered the wrong thing; however, our entire table was not impressed with the food. Every time we have gone we were disappointed. Our kids enjoy the atmosphere-- because it is "fun", but the food is bland and below average in quality. Lots of other options in the area with better food, better service...unique atmosphere will only get a restaurant so far.

data.title: Excellent casual dining
data.text: Nice casual dining. Two floors of quaint surrounding with ample tables and attentive service.  From Burgers to dinners.

data.title: Good Company "Library" upstairs is great for a larger group!
data.text: Good Company has been a local favorite with friends for a small group gathering anywhere in the restaurant. Recently I was part of a 20+ party in the library upstairs. What a nice venue, and the waitstaff seemed helpful but not intrusive. We waited for a short time in the bar until the library, which had been reserved, was ready.

data.title: Terrific Dining Experience
data.text: We always enjoy dining at Good Company. Everything on their menu is excellent. The service is terrific also Be sure to buy your drinks at the bar, and not at your table.
